abilities.name: Wish Upon a Star
abilities.effect: If you took this Pokémon as a face-down Prize card during your turn and your Bench isn't full, before you put it into your hand, you may put it onto your Bench and take 1 more Prize card.

attacks.name: Perish Dream
attacks.effect: This Pokémon is now Asleep. At the end of your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon will be Knocked Out.
